org.xbib.io

Interface Session<P extends Packet>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArchiveSession, CpioSession, EsBulkSession, TarSession, ZipSession

    public interface Session<P extends Packet>
    The Session interface is used for being opened, receive operations, and being closed. Sessions must be opened before the first operation and closed after the last operation.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Session.Mode
